sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.caPlease note, because of DL course-conflict scheduling issues, please double check to make sure this course does not conflict with any of the other courses you have registered in this term.

description: Practice and community-based (participatory) research related to health promotion, including its historical and philosophical roots. Application of social and behavioural theories to participatory research and the planning, implementation, and evaluation of community health promotion initiatives.
